Error.description: Error is returned when a handler encounters an error. It contains a simple error message that the developer can customize.

message.description: Error message (e.g., 'user not found', 'database connection failed')

FieldViolation.description: FieldViolation describes a single validation error for a specific field.

description.description: Human-readable description of the validation violation (e.g., 'must be a valid email address', 'required field missing')

field.description: The field path that failed validation (e.g., 'user.email' for nested fields). For header validation, this will be the header name (e.g., 'X-API-Key')

Int64EncodingTest.description: Int64EncodingTest demonstrates all int64/uint64 encoding variations.

commentedNumberInt64.description:
int64 field with leading comment (for description test)
 This is the user's unique identifier. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

defaultInt64.description: Default int64 (no annotation) - should be string in JSON

defaultUint64.description: Default uint64 (no annotation) - should be string in JSON

numberFixed64.description: fixed64 with NUMBER encoding. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

numberInt64.description: NUMBER encoding - should be number in JSON (precision risk for > 2^53). Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

numberSfixed64.description: sfixed64 with NUMBER encoding. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

numberSint64.description: sint64 with NUMBER encoding. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

numberUint64.description: NUMBER encoded uint64 - should be number in JSON. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

optionalNumberInt64.description: Optional int64 with NUMBER encoding. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

items.description: Repeated int64 with default STRING encoding
Repeated int64 with NUMBER encoding. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

stringInt64.description: Explicit STRING encoding - should be string in JSON

ValidationError.description: ValidationError is returned when request validation fails. It contains a list of field violations describing what went wrong.
